snippet.title: Dragon BUURRP! - Gameplay Android | iOS
snippet.description:
Dragon BUURRP! - Gameplay Android | iOS 
Categories: Casual
Languages: English, Spanish, Korean, Chinese
Status: Soft Launch 
Size: 341 MB
Internet: Online
Platform: Android | iOS 

From the old days, the Great Dragons needed three things:
treasures, princesses and, above all else… a super awesome tower!
Led by instinct, our newborn baby dragon set out to find a perfect tower for himself.
But the vile monsters of the tower dungeon were expecting the dragon’s arrival…
Join our cuddly baby dragon for an adventure to conquer the tower!

Features:
- This little dragon’s burp packs powerful energy! Use various elemental skills to wield the powerful Dragon Blade.
- Collect, upgrade, fuse powerful skill balls to create your own deck!
- Experiment with endless combinations! Shoot the ball as strong as you can to break blocks, just like pinball!
- Explore the Dragon Spire, This dungeon-like space changes every time you enter!
- A free offline game. No WiFi needed!
- Super simple controls. You can play with just one hand!
- A block-breaking roguelike RPG

💡 Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wemademax.projectsb
💡 APK https://apkcombo.com/dragon-buurrp/com.wemademax.projectsb/
💡 App Store https://apps.apple.com/us/app/dragon-buurrp/id6467609946
 ==========================
✅ Website (More new content) - https://www.palmassgames.ru
👉 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL96hUx2jy8gfcFLRn8NlHPX-guajC4NG-
======================================
Thanks for your views and likes!
Subscribe to the channel, it will motivate me to find more new content for you!
Many thanks!

#DragonBUURRP #New
#PalmassGames #Androidgames #Iosgames #AndroidApk #NewGames #AndroidGameplay
